articles.description: Old School Runescape Sailing is the first new skill ever added to the long-standing classic MMORPG, but it’ll only be introduced if players decide they like it.
articles.content: Old School Runescape unveils its first new skill, Sailing, and the team at Jagex wants to know if you like it enough to keep. The OSRS Sailing skill will be the first ever skill introduced to the cla… [+4423 chars]
